scripts.kill:dev: powershell -Command "Get-Process | Where-Object {$_.ProcessName -eq 'node'} | Stop-Process -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; if (Test-Path '.next\dev\lock') { Remove-Item '.next\dev\lock' -Force }; Write-Host 'Killed Next.js processes and removed lock file'"
scripts.dev:win: powershell -Command "if (Test-Path .env.dev) { copy .env.dev .env; copy .env.dev functions\.env } else { Write-Host 'Warning: .env.dev not found, skipping...' }" && next dev
scripts.dev: cp .env.dev .env 2>/dev/null || echo 'Warning: .env.dev not found, skipping...' && cp .env.dev functions/.env 2>/dev/null || true && next dev --turbopack
scripts.build:all: cd functions && npm run build && cd .. && npm run build
scripts.deploy:hosting: npm run build:hosting && firebase deploy --only hosting
scripts.target:dev: firebase deploy --only storage --project logitrack-tms-dev && firebase deploy --only firestore:logitrack-driver-app-dev --project logitrack-tms-dev &&  firebase deploy --only functions --project logitrack-tms-dev && firebase deploy --only hosting:logitrack-driver-app-dev --project logitrack-tms-dev
scripts.target:nonprod: firebase deploy --only storage --project logitrack-tms-dev && firebase deploy --only firestore:logitrack-driver-app-dev --project logitrack-tms-dev &&  firebase deploy --only functions --project logitrack-tms-dev && firebase deploy --only hosting:logitrack-driver-app-dev --project logitrack-tms-dev
scripts.target:test: firebase deploy --only storage --project logitrack-tms-dev && firebase deploy --only firestore:logitrack-driver-app-dev-test --project logitrack-tms-dev &&firebase deploy --only functions --project logitrack-tms-dev &&  firebase deploy --only hosting:mileage-test --project logitrack-tms-dev
scripts.target:prod: firebase deploy --only storage --project cjmoreapplicationform-prod && firebase deploy --only firestore:logitrack-driver-app-prod --project cjmoreapplicationform-prod && firebase deploy --only functions --project cjmoreapplicationform-prod && firebase deploy --only hosting:mileage --project cjmoreapplicationform-prod
